Method.title: Method
Method.description: Snobject methods must document their request and responses. These are named locally in the definitions section of the method spec.

Request.title: Request
Request.description: A request for a method to execute.

NullRequest.title: NullRequest
NullRequest.description: No parameters are required for this request.

Response.title: Response
Response.description: A (superficially JS callback style) response to a request on a method. Base type for inheriting. Indicates the response to the request, not necessarily the decision on it. May be empty in the case of asyncronous methods.

error.description: Fail response, inspired by program exit codes. If method is called natively, this code may be implied by negative return or callback.

data.description: Successful response. If method is called natively, this code may be implied by positive return or callback.

oneOf.description: Response data could be null or any type... Overwrite this base type!

SchemaResponse.title: SchemaResponse
SchemaResponse.description: The json schema for this snobject.

code.title: code
code.description: An integer code field which can represent program exit code or HTTP response code. May be ignored in native method call.

message.title: message
message.description: The error message, or a string representation.

version.title: version
version.description: Since Snobjects are standalone apps, they can be versioned independently using [semantic versioning](http://semver.org).

license.description: The [SPDX](http://spdx.org) string representation of the license for this snobject.

getSchema.title: getSchema
getSchema.description: Get the schema for this snobject.

addSchema.title: addSchema
addSchema.description: Add a schema to the validator this snobject.

validate.title: validate
validate.description: Validate this snobject, using its own schema and validator.

title: Snobject
description:
Snobject aka [(JSON) Schema](http://json-schema.org/) [Naked Object](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naked_objects) is a software architecture pattern based on json schema and naked object. This Javascript reference implementation provides strong object-orientation principles to Javascript objects. Each snobject is self contained and self describing, managing all of its own resources and interfaces.

Each snobject includes it's own json schema, accessible through the `getSchema`, `addSchema`, and `validate` methods. This level of introspection combines code comments and API documentation into a single, runtime-accessible location.
